QuestData.Title: Lousy Pieces of Ship
QuestData.Description: Shoddy workmanship! There's no other explanation...$b$bThese ships must've been constructed in a hurry. Entire pieces of armor plating are falling off without even sustaining a direct hit!$b$bI'll show them how it is to be done. But first, I need you to recover the pieces from the sea floor.$b$bReturn to me with the pieces and I'll do the rest.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover 10 pieces of Sunken Scrap Metal.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to recover that armor plating, $r?
QuestData.RewardText: Good work, $r.$b$bI'll show them how an armored ship should be built!
